name: Neon Nyan Dash
description:
Game built for UGJ2020.

Basically a double-sided Chrome Dino game. But, yeah, DOUBLE-SIDED!

Use Z to jump (and jump twice), X to change side.

The theme of a starfield is acutally inspired by the music that I found for this game, titled as Cosmic Love, by Bruno E.

If you get 800+ points, that means you've reached the maximum difficulty of this game, where the speed is twiced compared to the beginning, and all map features are unlocked. No worry if you cannot reach there, it is difficult.

Thank you for playing (and reading) this. Have fun!

Am I a Beginner?

First game jam for me. Had one semester's course experience as a game developer. So, yeah, should count as a beginner.

Game Engine:

As you can see, Unity, of course.

Theme of "Two":

The game mechanism explores the idea of  a world with two sides.

Assets I Used:

https://www.deviantart.com/juicyfruitgirly/art/Cat-Run-Cycle-Guide-229010455 (Cat Run Cycle)
https://fonts.google.com/specimen/Pangolin (Font)
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC0OnsB1dH_tEEyfihBlq4bg (BGM)
https://www.shadertoy.com/view/ldKGDd (Stafield Shader)
http://www.orangefreesounds.com/original-cat-sound/v (Cat SE)
https://www.soundsnap.com/587_foley_clothes_movement_medium_jump_land_special_close_wav (Jump SE)
